entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text:
@Keir_Starmer What it is needed is real opposition not collaboration with a government responsible for a wrong strategy causing so many avoidable deaths. Their responses to the crisis has been to put businesses' interest before workers' interests. Socialist policies are the answer.
#COVID19
